sentence.Network_en: They are using state-of-the-art graphics in the film's special effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在电影的特技中使用最新的动画制图法。

entry.tran: 使用最先进技术的;体现最高水平的
entry.def: If you describe something as state-of-the-art, you mean that it is the best available because it has been made using the most modern techniques and technology.

example.tran: 最先进军事装备的生产

means.word_mean: 1. the highest level of development at a particular time (especially the present time);
